New Records: Luka Modric became the oldest goalscorer in European Championship history at 39 years old
Key Match Events: Luka Modric missed a penalty but later scored an equalizer in the 88th minute
Mattia Zaccagni scored the winning goal in the 120th minute
Croatia had a penalty appeal denied but Modric scored again
Pre-Game Insights: Italy's coach Spalletti used a 3-5-2 system but it didn't perform well
The match had a tense atmosphere with fireworks and high tension
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Modric seemed emotional, possibly reflecting on his career
Italy's players celebrated wildly after the unexpected victory
Croatia's performance was criticized as underperforming despite their technical ability
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was intense with dramatic moments including Modric's goals and Zaccagni's winner
The electrifying atmosphere and the late drama were significant
